name: Skyline Tweet
description:
Simple tweet cart that generates a scrolling city skyline

y=0 h=128 cls(1) ::_:: memcpy(0x6001,0x6000,0x2000) if rnd() < 0.1 then y = mid(y + rnd(60) - 30, 0, h) end rectfill(0,0,1,h,1) rectfill(0,y,1,h,0) for w = y+2, h, 2 do if rnd() < (h-y)/600 then pset(x,w,7) end end if rnd() < 0.01 then y = rnd(h) end flip() goto _
